## Entry Points
<hr>
- **Entry Points: Pathways and Possibilities to Support Student Learning about Data and AI**
  - Elevate Your Work Project
  - Three-webinar series, each with a different focus

## Entry Points: Event #1
<hr>
- **Topic: Postsecondary Efforts**
  - [February 2023]{.date}
  - Showcasing different configurations of university programs & pathways that are positioned at the intersections of data science, AI, and education
  - Undergraduate degree programs, pre-service programs, continuing teacher ed programs, other graduate programs

## Entry Points: Event #2
<hr>
- **Topic: K-12 Efforts**
  - [March 2023]{.date}
  - Highlighting opportunities to support data science and AI education in classrooms, schools, and districts
  - Landscape data science + AI programs curriculum + highlighting data science education projects at UTK

## Entry Points: Event #3
<hr>
- **Topic: National Frameworks & Recommendation**
  - [April 2023]{.date}
  - Exploring national frameworks and recommendations for advancing data science and AI education
  - GAISE III, Data Science Learning Progressions, CSTA PK-12 Computer Science Standards, NASEM Competencies

## AAIC
<hr>
- **AAIC: Appalachian AI Corps**
  - Funded by AI Tennessee
  - Goal: Empower rural Appalachian communities to use AI to support their region, communities, and families.
  - Working in two area school districts heavily affected by Hurricane Helene
    - Using Edge AI water buoys, data science to analyze water quality
